website_summaries.verdict: Unlike the other Keds sneakers, the Craze II Leather model showcases sportier features inspired by the outdoor footwear. This shoe delivers sturdier elements with abundant of comfort while staying stylish and chic. Though some complained that Keds failed to revamp the arch support, there is still a significant margin of users that gave this shoe merit more than a demerit.
pros: The Keds Craze II Leather comes in medium and wide widths
The majority of the respondents shared that they would highly recommend this sneaker to their peers
Many reviewers noted that the upper of this model molds on their foot perfectly
A large percentage of the buyers revealed that this sneaker is very comfortable
Few reviewers endorsed this sneaker for traveling
For the majority of the wearers, this model runs true to size and width
Quite many buyers liked that this pair is easy to clean and maintain
Some shared that they could easily dab the dirt off by using a moist cloth
Some commented that they enjoyed the roomy toe box of the Craze II Leather
A couple of reviewers mentioned that this kick is made of high-quality materials
A handful of buyers praised the lightness of this footwear
This shoe's flexibility has been commended few times in the review section
This shoe can be styled with almost any outfit, shared by many reviewers
cons: Not many buyers criticized that the Keds Craze II Leather has insufficient arch support
A couple of disappointed buyers did not recommend this for long walks as it caused them blisters on their heel
Few users complained that the footbed is not well ventilated

customer_reviews.title: Runs Short
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased Keds for several years now. I purchased these to replace a different pair of black leather Keds that have seen better days. The ones I'm replacing are a different style that has been discontinued. I purchased the 9M which is what I have always bought. These are a little too short. All the other Keds I own (that fit fine) were made in China, these were made in Vietnam. Don't know if it is just the style or if a different method of sizing is used between the countries. They are made very well and would recommend buying them a 1/2 size larger. I'll be returning them and reordering them i a 9 1/2M.
customer_reviews.author: AngW

customer_reviews.title: IS IT JUST ME?....
customer_reviews.text: Or do they look a but off to you? DO NOT GET ME WRONG THESE ARE SO COMFORTABLE AND THEY FIT PERFECTLY. It's just that they just look.. off..... like if the end of the shoe doesn't really align with the center of the shoe designs. You can clearly see this on the right shoe. It bothers me a lot and I could clearly tell they when I first took them out of the box. Anyways, I still love them. Cute shoes, maybe I'm just crazy. Nevertheless, I am wearing these every single day. They are like tiny mattresses on my feet. Very orthopedic, and just what I needed for my arc support..
customer_reviews.author: (NOT) obito anymore.

customer_reviews.title: What went wrong with sizing?
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in fit. I always have worn a 7 1/2 M in Keds. However, when I received the shoes in 7 1/2 M, they were too short and too narrow, not comfortable. Therefore, I would recommend getting a half size larger. Sorry
customer_reviews.author: Jeanice M

customer_reviews.title: Classic, comfy sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Adorable, low-profile, comfy sneakers. Bought them for a trip to DC, but thinking they may need an insole for more support. Fit true to size. I’m a size 7.5 and the 7.5 fit perfectly, with a little room even. I’m glad I didn’t size up like other reviews suggested.
customer_reviews.author: MiaKai

customer_reviews.title: review of the Keds sneakers
customer_reviews.text: The leather version--perhaps because it is leather--is a bit tighter fit than the canvas version. I'm hoping it will stretch out and become as comfortable as the canvas version.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Benton-Short

customer_reviews.title: Best sneaker for a woman with wide foot which runs in my family.
customer_reviews.text: This sneaker was very nice looking as well as very nice looking. I liked the fact that my feet never felt pinched or over heated. The style was really nice and the leather was soft and immediately comfortable from the first day to the last day. I hope it will come back in production because it is very difficult to find all the comfort in such a wide width shoe. I hope it will be manufactured again, exactly the same as the pair I had.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. D.C.M .

customer_reviews.title: Great Price - comfortable from the first day on.
customer_reviews.text: Delivered promptly. Felt great even on the first day of wearing. Ordered two pairs because I was not sure of what would be the best size. The 8W was the best and perfect fit, gave the 7.5 size M width to my neighbor and she delighted in them just as I did. And equally delightful the price was great at $34.95 per pair. Have been wearing Keds for decades now.
customer_reviews.author: Geraldine Fortin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoes for a perfect price.
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous shoes! High quality, leather, good arch support, very comfortable. Those shoes are exactly half size smaller than the regular size. According to reviews I ordered half size up. My regular size is 6. So 6.5 fits just right for me. Excellent product for a very fair price. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Great choice as work shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes for work, comfortable and easy. No major issues, fits as expected- I wear a size 9 and size 9 fit perfectly. I do see some slight wear and tear on the felt area near top of laces already, not a big deal especially for the price. (And I tend to just slip shoes on and off without untying, so this is probably partly to blame). I like the bottoms of the shoes, a good medium amount of traction and no slipping on wet surfaces. I could definitely upgrade the laces, they are about average quality. Others pros include- good toe protection, fairly waterproof, and good amount of comfort if you are on your feet all day.
customer_reviews.author: keyschica

customer_reviews.title: but they are very comfortable! Really cute and seem to be constructed a ...
customer_reviews.text: I've only worn them about 4 times now, but they are very comfortable! Really cute and seem to be constructed a lot better than the regular style Keds I have ordered from here before.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel R.

customer_reviews.title: Helps with stability.
customer_reviews.text: Love my Keds!! This is my favorite brand for comfort and stability. I have taken several falls resulting in fractures. These shoes make me feel more stable. At age 69 I have had falls resulting fractures from both legs, one arm and 3 ribs. Therefore I like to feel steady on my feet and these help tremendously. Love my Keds!!!
customer_reviews.author: MO2570

customer_reviews.title: Speechless! Its actually funny
customer_reviews.text: I have NEVER had an issue with Amazon. Today, I received a pair of Keds which were two different models and both of the left foot. I am annoyed because I need them to go on a trip so it is an inconvenience. Not happy. They do fit well.. on my left foot -both
customer_reviews.author: A. Esquerre

customer_reviews.title: Great for standing all day!
customer_reviews.text: I stand all day at my work. Te soles of my feet sometimes hurt, and I also have a tear in a knee that makes most shoes impossible to wear without causing pain. These shoes have an insole that reminds me of gel insoles, and with that my feet do not hurt and my knee does not feel painful after long days at work!
customer_reviews.author: soulanchor

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to like them
customer_reviews.text: They are very nice looking shoes. I really wanted to like them. I purchased because my nursing school requires black leather shoes, but I will be returning. They feel like they are going to slip off my heel or pull my sock down the whole time they are on my feet. In fact, they did pull my sock down to below my heel! I am not sure if a larger size would work but I am going to return them and shop around for something else.
customer_reviews.author: stefaniepast

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was expecting. Wish the shoe laces were of better quality, I will need to replace them. Thin and knot like nobody's business. These aren't as nice as I remember them being in the 80s but they are serviceable and comfortable for teaching. And are nice and wide for a fairly wide foot.
customer_reviews.author: Beach dreamin' in the Rockies

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Stylish Keds
customer_reviews.text: I've had my eye on these for a while, Ked's website was frequently out of this combination, black/black, in my size, plus Amazon beats Ked's sale price so why bother with their website. Save yourself the aggravation of multiple websites when you can find the best selection, style, color and price of shoes right here. These shoes are leather and fit true to size. Very comfortable and lightweight and I think they are really cute and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Susie Woods

customer_reviews.title: I Like Them
customer_reviews.text: Wanted an all black pair and these caught my eye. They didn’t have 1/2 sizes. I went up size up for extra comfort and in case I want to wear with socks. They fit good, not too big, just right. They look like a nice quality pair of shoes. They are very comfortable but no arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Nilis

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for everyday long hours on the feet. I ordered a wide and it’s definitely true to size and very comfortable with cushion inside. The leather quality is a very nice touch to a casual sneaker.
customer_reviews.author: Tayyaba

customer_reviews.title: Very cute.
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and feel of these shoes. Nice preppy look. I ordered a 8.5W and they fit perfectly. The only thing I don't like is they are much heavier than expected. These would not be be a good choice for a day of walking. Nice for running a few errands or trips to the grocery.
customer_reviews.author: Leesa Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Sad they didn’t last
customer_reviews.text: I loved these tennis shoes, but the inside sole didn’t last very long. After normal wear it started to develop a hole in each heel of the shoe after about 4 months. I really wish these would have lasted longer as they were my favorite shoes.
customer_reviews.author: InTheWoods

customer_reviews.title: Size 11 wide Keds
customer_reviews.text: White Keds look great but they are a bit wider than expected. Sort of fits like a size 11.5 from heel to toe. Lots of toe room. I am tall 5”10 and wear size 11 so they are very comfortable but loose. I don’t like tight shoes so these are great for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jay B

customer_reviews.title: i RECCOMEND THESE SHOES..
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THESE TENNIS SHOES. THEY ARE TRUE TO SIZE AND VERY COMFORTABLE. I WORE A PAIR BEFORE. IYOU LIKE THE LEATHER MUCH EASIER TO KEEP CLEAN. THE CANVUS ONES ARE ALSO A GOOD BUY YOU CANT GO WRONG WITH THESE.THEY HAVE A GOOD COUSION INSOUL. i WOULD BUY AGAIN.
customer_reviews.author: elsie riggs

customer_reviews.title: Lost tennis shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I love Ked’s tennis shoes! The only reason I give a 1 star rating is because my package was “lost”! and had planned on wearing my new Keds to a special family gathering. Amazon did refund my account. I’m thankful for that.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Dickson

customer_reviews.title: Fits small
customer_reviews.text: These are to the smaller side, initially when i put them on they were so tight, I had to put them on with thin socks and after wearing for a couple hours they stretched a bit and was comfortable enough to wear. I recommend 1/2 to 1 size up. But overall I love them comfortable so far.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Love KEDS!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love a fresh white pair of KEDS for the spring and summer. These have a really nice supportive sole they are a bit heavier than the average pair of keds. Will be better for hours on the feet.
customer_reviews.author: petie pie

customer_reviews.title: Stylish white sneaks bb
customer_reviews.text: I erred a size up and am very happy. They are a tiny bit wide but for 5+ miles of walking a day, they are perfect. The leather is easy to clean. I wear them with everything. They gave a classic 80s tennis shoe look. They are my go to shoes now :)
customer_reviews.author: AlexisLeya

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are my all time favorite sneakers. They’re easy to slip on and clean up nicely. They look cute with jeans, a spring dress, or my jammies to check the mail! This is my 2nd pair in about 6 years. My last ones I wore a hole in the side. Love em!
customer_reviews.author: Shawna MikiTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Part time work shoes
customer_reviews.text: Fashionable work shoes for a picky teen. My daughter loves wearing these to work. Not great for long shifts (over 8hrs of comfort) but a good fit for picky employers who want black leather shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Garvoille

customer_reviews.title: Hot to wear in summer.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always liked Keds.; especially white ones! These, however, are pretty hot on your feet. Good for Spring and Fall, but too hot for Summer.
customer_reviews.author: Prof. G.

customer_reviews.title: Love Keds
customer_reviews.text: I like the style, my size 11 foot does not look big. I always buy this sneaker when the previous one wears out or is too dirty and won't come clean.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Very narrow
customer_reviews.text: They look nice and appear well made. The length of the shoe is just right, but they are very narrow. Will return and choose something else.
customer_reviews.author: HateToCook

customer_reviews.title: This is my third pair of Keds!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe! It is the most comfortable shoe around. Offers fabulous support and they wear great. Casual shoe for everyday and walking around. I love this shoe
customer_reviews.author: Genna Corsentino

customer_reviews.title: Great Sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Instant gratification on these sneakers. They are very comfortable. I like that they are well cushioned. I'm very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit to size.
customer_reviews.text: The shoe itself is comfortable and well made. I ordered a 8.5 US women’s because that is the size I wear. It was too small and very tight around the sides. I had to exchange it for a bigger size which puts me out another two days without proper work shoes. I recommend getting at least half a size larger than you normally wear.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Feltych

customer_reviews.title: I like that these are available in different widths and 1/2 ...
customer_reviews.text: I like that these are available in different widths and 1/2 sizes. I wear a 8 1/2 W Comfortable and well made. My only complaint is that that insole in one shoe was for a narrow not wide. And my foot hangs off the insole. Replacing the insoles.
customer_reviews.author: Joy C

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These fit great and only took a few days to break it if that. Got these specifically for a vacation I knew I’d be walking a lot and they were great!
customer_reviews.author: CMW17

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: These are my go to shoes when I haven’t had a recent pedicure. They’re cute and work well with shorts and capris.
customer_reviews.author: D. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and good-looking sneaks!
customer_reviews.text: Ked’s is the best, bar none! This is the third pair of these shoes I’ve ordered recently, and I love them. They run a tad small, so order a half size bigger than you normally would. VERY comfortable shoes. I’d recommend them every time.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money good quality
customer_reviews.text: Love these Tennis will buy again so pretty I decide to work out in but to wear with my casual outfit it's a buy you wont regret I love them
customer_reviews.author: Candle 🕯Light💡

customer_reviews.title: Great leather sneakers for the price.  Plus they're Keds!
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about them. They are really comfortable and good to wear to work on "casual Fridays."
customer_reviews.author: C.

customer_reviews.title: Runs small.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the way they looked, unfortunately I had to send them back because they were too small. I am usually a 8.5 in keds so it surprised me that these did not fit.
customer_reviews.author: MoStrz

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Got these for a one time event. However, the comfort & fit are way better than I expected. I can add my heal lift in one shoe & it fits fine.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Almost 5 star.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy, although they are a bit small. I always get a 9 in sneakers which leaves room for space. These fit are more of a 8 1/2. Other than that they are nice and soft, cute as well.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shoes except that they are very heavy especially for someone who has had foot surgery. Very heavy when walking. I had to order a pair of regular leather keds.
customer_reviews.author: R. Puckett

customer_reviews.title: Great daily and casual wear shoe
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great!!! Leather looks good and wears well, plenty of support and comfort while running errands. True to size, I ordered my usual size. If and when they wear out I plan to buy another pair. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: margaritatica

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much perfect
customer_reviews.text: The only complaint I have is the minor one of seeing my toe when I flex it a certain way through the top of the show. Otherwise it is a perfect shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fine for short distance walking.
customer_reviews.text: I have a narrow foot, but these fit in the toe for me.. A little too wide in the heel for me, but still worked. I would like even more arch, but these are not my long distance walking shoes. They are fine for the way I use them.
customer_reviews.author: LATH

customer_reviews.title: Nice little shoe for summer
customer_reviews.text: Wore them last summer and just brought them out again for this year. I've been very happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: sljelm

customer_reviews.title: Great sneaker
customer_reviews.text: I really like these sneakers they look good and are comfortable, they ran true to size for me.
customer_reviews.author: carol

customer_reviews.title: Look terrific and fit as expected but much less cushioning inside ...
customer_reviews.text: Look terrific and fit as expected but much less cushioning inside than described. Disappointed as they would not be comfortable on long walks.
customer_reviews.author: goldens

customer_reviews.title: Great quality shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my mother, she loves her Ked's. They are comfortable for her and fit great!
customer_reviews.author: Hector Emilio

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I've owned many many pairs of keds in my 57 years. Always dependable and predictable to fit right and last. I wear a size 7 and these fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Pugchick

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again for work.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes for work. Tight for the first few times I wore them. I am typically an 8-8.5 and I purchased an 8.5. Will definitely get a 9 if I purchase again because they run small. They are not non slip but are water resistant leather. The inside molds to your foot and is so cushy.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes but no wAy to returned them
customer_reviews.text: No return form inside package. I was informed that a prelabel would come. It has been two weeks and no label has come or on the computer. No number to call for help. This appears to be a scam and I am out a lot of money.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Crazy for keds!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! Fit as expected, and very comfortable! Love that they are leather!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki L. Jespersen

customer_reviews.title: my favorite shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe. it fits perfectly, not too big or too tight! Very classy looking sport shoe. I would buy again, and highly recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: peggy silkowski

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable shoe. Typical Keds sneaker. They as tried on time.
customer_reviews.author: June

customer_reviews.title: attractive but narrow and not comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: these sneakers are very stiff and narrow. not meant for wide feet. the pinch and hurt and should be ordered a size up even for people with narrow feet.
customer_reviews.author: haweeka

customer_reviews.title: this the first ones that didn't fit like a glove
customer_reviews.text: I have worn keds for years, this the first ones that didn't fit like a glove. Disappointed because I've always liked the style.
customer_reviews.author: kathy

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable. I put them on and first day I had them went to the outlet mall and walked all over the place. Zero break in period needed. They go with jeans, or shorts.
customer_reviews.author: MAShopper

customer_reviews.title: Poor fitting shoe
customer_reviews.text: The heel is so large that my foot slips out. Would not recommend unless you have extra wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: valleymimi

customer_reviews.title: Jed’s sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I like these sneakers. Most brands are too wide for my feet and my foot slides forward. These fit like the Prestige and have the same look
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Byrne

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe but...
customer_reviews.text: The shoe was purchased for my daughter. It was comfortable and fit as expected. The material it was made from seemed durable. However, the outer band came apart from the sole after 3 months. Perhaps it should have been stitched. Was hoping that it would last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great old school leather Keds
customer_reviews.text: Great old school white leather Keds. Comfortable, true to size, clean up well, last a long time. I wish they'd bring back their white zip-up leather sneakers, but these are my daily kicks for now.
customer_reviews.author: Moonbow

customer_reviews.title: Great sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Fits exactly as it should, and sooo comfortable! I've worn Keds for years, and this is by far one of the best.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Cosby

customer_reviews.title: Best Shoes EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy and fit as expected. Would repurchase and recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: pbjamzz

customer_reviews.title: Have bought both white & navy but not able to wear them everyday.
customer_reviews.text: Ok. Nice looking when new. Doesn't wash up well when soiled. Have to wear heel pads for better fit. Hurt my feet after worn for few hrs. Looked sharp when brand new. Thought they would mold to my feet better with use.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy B.

customer_reviews.title: Stylish Tennis Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very nice durable shoe. I love Keds. Very pretty and flattering to my feet. Comfortable too.
customer_reviews.author: Freedom Byrd Windsong

customer_reviews.title: I thought they would have been more comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: the back of shoes digs into my heel. They seem a little snug for my feet. I have narrow feet and bought Medium. I thought they would have been more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable fit
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable fit. Exactly what I wanted and expected. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: doris hopper

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable Sneakers
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable. That's why I like the Keds brand.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are a little narrow, but still fit nicely. Normally wear 6 1/2- 7. These are size 7 I like that they wear well with shorts or capris.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Oder size larger than normal shoe size
customer_reviews.text: I could not put shoe on foot because it was too small
customer_reviews.author: Theraid McCree

customer_reviews.title: Great looking leather shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Very good looking shoe. Fits like a Keds; not a high arch, but that is how Keds fit. Good inersole lining. Will be easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kardrea

customer_reviews.title: Work shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love this sneaker, it is my second pair. I ordered them for work because at any given time I can be on my feet from 3-16 hours. They are extremely comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Latoya

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, they look great! I went a half size up as recommended in the comments, however, in my case at least, I would say that they're true to size since they fit a bit larger so size 7 would have been perfect. I have narrow feet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable. What more can you say about Keds? If you like Keds, you will like these.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Mike

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable & seems to be made well
customer_reviews.text: Shoe are noisy when walking. Sound clunky. Hoping they just need to be broken in. Comfortable & seems to be made well .
customer_reviews.author: D D

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So comfy, I'd buy them in every color if available!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley N. Wilkins

customer_reviews.title: I love the way they fit
customer_reviews.text: I love the way they fit, and they feel very orthopedic which I need.
customer_reviews.author: Suz

customer_reviews.title: Love them. Fits with orthotics
customer_reviews.text: Love them. Fits with orthotics. Like a little wider for toes.. I have feet problems so have a hard time finding shoes or sneakers that fit.
customer_reviews.author: elsa m. groetzinger

customer_reviews.title: Another great buy from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: They were for my wife. She loves them and won’t wear any other kind.
customer_reviews.author: David Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd pair. They are very comfortable and have a comfy insert that gives good support.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better Quality Keds
customer_reviews.text: These Keds are much better quality than their regular leather sneakers. The are sturdy, heavy duty leather. Good padded insole. They offer some arch support, not a lot, but some. The sole is good quality and durable. These fit true to size in width and length. They offer plenty of toe room in length and width. One thing to note; the sole squeaks when making certain movement on hard services. It makes the sound you hear when basketball players make that sudden turn around on the court. The sole have a non slip grid.
customer_reviews.author: Trend

customer_reviews.title: VERY HEAVY SNEAKER
customer_reviews.text: I have worn these sneakers several times, and they are very heavy. It is even awkward to walk in because the sneaker itself is too heavy. I am sorry I bought these sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: MARY ERS.

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, dressy enough for office work and comfortable enough making many steps each day.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley cook

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: The Keds are well made. They are comfortable and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Bbrowne

customer_reviews.title: Great Black sneakers but too small to wear!
customer_reviews.text: I like the keds sneakers but they were small and narrow on my feet. I decided to return them for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Liz H

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes so much. I wear with everything; shorts, dresses, etc. Easy to wipe clean
customer_reviews.author: dkdwpowe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best pair of tennis shoes and they are waterproof, so they will always stay white...
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Great walking shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Already had a pair in white that were super comfortable! The black ones did not disappoint!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Moore

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe. Bought the exact style 2 years ago and they have worn well and been comfortable,
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie A Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfy and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes! im normally an 8.5 in shoes..and i get 8 in keds due to sizing.. but i had to get 8.5 on these and they still fit comfy
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Espinales

customer_reviews.title: arch support
customer_reviews.text: arch suport was okay for my left foot. I tend to get planters warts and too much support irratate them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was hoping they would fit like the Kids I already have
customer_reviews.text: The shoe was too long and too wide. I was hoping they would fit like the Kids I already have.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie D

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable for everyday wear especially if you don't want to wear bulky walking shoes. The leather is easy to keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: I am a big fan of keds but these don't ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fan of keds but these don't have the arch support I had envisioned. They're just ok
customer_reviews.author: Lucy H. Hawes

customer_reviews.title: Women's keds ortho.
customer_reviews.text: What I like is the color and the style. Great for arch support I need since my bunion surgery recently.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Alvin

customer_reviews.title: 10 M should be 10 M
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a leather pair of tennis shoes. they are a little tight, but they should stretch
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Entire Bottom Came Un-Glued
customer_reviews.text: The entire bottom of these shoes came un-glued, the shoe is completely falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: WindyHed

product_meta.title: Keds womens Craze Ii Leather Craze Ii Leather
product_meta.description: Add some insane comfort to your shoe game with the Keds Craze II Canvas! Sporty canvas upper. Lace-up front closure provides a secure fit around your foot. Soft and breathable jersey lining allows for all-day comfort. Features the antimicrobial Ortholite® sockliner to help reduce odors. A Memory Foam footbed offers maximum comfort. Durable rubber outsole flexes with each and every step you take. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 10 oz Product measurements were taken using size 7.5, width B - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
feature_bullets: Durable rubber outsole for additional comfort.
